about_the_game:
Lofi Milk Delivery is a captivating match 3 puzzle game with 5 gorgeous futa women, all ready to play with their guys and deliver them their milk. You can pick any of the girls to start with, each has 4 levels with increasing difficulty and after each level, you get a reward. Images are explicit and detailed.

Features
- Futa on male fantasy
- Different futa girls to select (play in your own order)
- 5 girls, 8 chapters to play, each chapter with 4 game matches
- 37 reward images accessible from gallery
- Easy to understand tutorial with level where you can experiment with all unlocked skills
- Original and chill lofi soundtrack



Gameplay:
Match gems of the same color to progress through levels and uncover the story. The game is divided into multiple chapters and each chapter has a few match 3 levels with increasing difficulty. There is also a tutorial level explaining the mechanics. After solving a level, you unlock an image - discover juicy and sexy scenes with beautiful futas on males. You can find these images later in the gallery. The difficulty of the game is challenging, yet not hard. It is the perfect difficulty for anyone to enjoy the story and immerse themselves in the puzzle!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity featuring futanari women and regular guys.

name: Lofi Milk Delivery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Featuring futa on male fantasy and captivating match 3 puzzle gameplay, with ultra detailed and realistic reward images after each match.
